Uses of Class
net.tinyos.prowler.Simulator

  • Packages that use Simulator 
    Package Description
    net.tinyos.prowler  

    • Uses of Simulator in net.tinyos.prowler

      Fields in net.tinyos.prowler declared as Simulator 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Simulator Node.simulator
      A reference to the simulator in which the Node exists.
      Methods in net.tinyos.prowler that return Simulator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Simulator Node.getSimulator() 
      Constructors in net.tinyos.prowler with parameters of type Simulator 
      Constructor and Description
      Display(Simulator sim, double width)
      A parameterized constructor of the Display class, creates a 800 by 800 square shaped area on the screen.
      GaussianRadioModel(Simulator sim)
      A parameterized constructor used to set the simulator at creation time.
      Mica2Node(Simulator sim, RadioModel radioModel)
      Parameterized constructor, it set both the Simulator in which this mote exists and the RadioModel which is used by this mote.
      Node(Simulator sim, RadioModel radioModel)
      Parameterized constructor, sets the simulator and creates an initial neighborhood using the RadioModel as a factory.
      RayleighRadioModel(Simulator sim)
      Parameterized constructor, besides setting the simulator it also adds its clock event to it and sets the updateTime to a default value back in the past so that it is reset at the first transmission.
      TestBroadcastNode(Simulator sim, RadioModel radioModel)
